entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 9:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
